result.eng: You gave the wrong answer.
result.ga: Thug tú an freagra mícheart
result.orig: Thug tú an freagra mícheart
result.html: Thug tú an freagra mícheartYou gave the wrong answer.
result.ponchtml: Ṫug tú an freagra míċeartYou gave the wrong answer.

result.eng: Did I give you enough food?
result.ga: Ar thug mé dóthain bia duit
result.orig: Ar thug mé dóthain bia duit
result.html: Ar thug mé dóthain bia duitDid I give you enough food?
result.ponchtml: Ar ṫug mé dóṫain bia duitDid I give you enough food?

result.eng: Have you noticed that she is gone?
result.ga: Ar thug tú faoi deara go bhfuil sí imithe
result.orig: Ar thug tú faoi deara go bhfuil sí imithe
result.html: Ar thug tú faoi deara go bhfuil sí imitheHave you noticed that she is gone?
result.ponchtml: Ar ṫug tú faoi deara go ḃfuil sí imiṫeHave you noticed that she is gone?

result.eng: She gave them food an drink.
result.ga: Thug sí bia agus deoch dóibh
result.orig: Thug sí bia agus deoch dóibh
result.html: Thug sí bia agus deoch dóibhShe gave them food an drink.
result.ponchtml: Ṫug sí bia agus deoċ dóiḃShe gave them food an drink.

result.eng: What made you do that?
result.ga: Cad a thug ort é sin a dhéanamh
result.orig: Cad a thug ort é sin a dhéanamh
result.html: Cad a thug ort é sin a dhéanamhWhat made you do that?
result.ponchtml: Cad a ṫug ort é sin a ḋéanaṁWhat made you do that?

result.eng: He asked me a question but I didn't answer him.
result.ga: Chuir sé ceist orm ach níor thug mé freagra dó
result.orig: Chuir sé ceist orm ach níor thug mé freagra dó
result.html: Chuir sé ceist orm ach níor thug mé freagra dóHe asked me a question but I didn't answer him.
result.ponchtml: Ċuir sé ceist orm aċ níor ṫug mé freagra dóHe asked me a question but I didn't answer him.

result.eng: What made you want to learn Irish?
result.ga: Céard a thug ort an Ghaeilge a fhoghlaim
result.orig: Céard a thug ort an Ghaeilge a fhoghlaim
result.html: Céard a thug ort an Ghaeilge a fhoghlaimWhat made you want to learn Irish?
result.ponchtml: Céard a ṫug ort an Ġaeilge a ḟoġlaimWhat made you want to learn Irish?

result.eng: He left Connemara and took to London.
result.ga: D'fhág sé Conamara agus thug Londain air féin
result.orig: D'fhág sé Conamara agus thug Londain air féin
result.html: D'fhág sé Conamara agus thug Londain air féinHe left Connemara and took to London.
result.ponchtml: D'ḟág sé Conamara agus ṫug Londain air féinHe left Connemara and took to London.

result.eng: I didn't pay much attention to it.
result.ga: Níor thug mé mórán airde air
result.orig: Níor thug mé mórán airde air
result.html: Níor thug mé mórán airde airI didn't pay much attention to it.
result.ponchtml: Níor ṫug mé mórán airde airI didn't pay much attention to it.

result.eng: The book gave me food for thought.
result.ga: Thug an leabhar ábhar machnaimh dom
result.orig: Thug an leabhar ábhar machnaimh dom
result.html: Thug an leabhar ábhar machnaimh domThe book gave me food for thought.
result.ponchtml: Ṫug an leaḃar áḃar maċnaiṁ domThe book gave me food for thought.

result.eng: The professor gave an interesting lecture.
result.ga: Thug an t-ollamh léacht shuimiúil
result.orig: Thug an t-ollamh léacht shuimiúil
result.html: Thug an t-ollamh léacht shuimiúilThe professor gave an interesting lecture.
result.ponchtml: Ṫug an t-ollaṁ léaċt ẛuimiúilThe professor gave an interesting lecture.

result.eng: Somebody gave it to me.
result.ga: Thug duine éigin dom é
result.orig: Thug duine éigin dom é
result.html: Thug duine éigin dom éSomebody gave it to me.
result.ponchtml: Ṫug duine éigin dom éSomebody gave it to me.

result.eng: We approached the work in a systematic manner.
result.ga: Thug muid faoin obair ar bhonn córasach
result.orig: Thug muid faoin obair ar bhonn córasach
result.html: Thug muid faoin obair ar bhonn córasachWe approached the work in a systematic manner.
result.ponchtml: Ṫug muid faoin obair ar ḃonn córasaċWe approached the work in a systematic manner.

result.eng: I noticed the mistake.
result.ga: Thug mé an botún faoi deara
result.orig: Thug mé an botún faoi deara
result.html: Thug mé an botún faoi dearaI noticed the mistake.
result.ponchtml: Ṫug mé an botún faoi dearaI noticed the mistake.

result.eng: I gave him permission to sit down.
result.ga: Thug mé cead dó suí síos
result.orig: Thug mé cead dó suí síos
result.html: Thug mé cead dó suí síosI gave him permission to sit down.
result.ponchtml: Ṫug mé cead dó suí síosI gave him permission to sit down.

result.eng: I visited my aunt in New York.
result.ga: Thug mé cuairt ar m'aintín i Nua-Eabhrac
result.orig: Thug mé cuairt ar m'aintín i Nua-Eabhrac
result.html: Thug mé cuairt ar m'aintín i Nua-EabhracI visited my aunt in New York.
result.ponchtml: Ṫug mé cuairt ar m'aintín i Nua-EaḃracI visited my aunt in New York.

result.eng: I got down to writing the essay and I had it finished in two hours.
result.ga: Thug mé faoin aiste agus bhí sí críochnaithe agam i gceann dhá uair an chloig
result.orig: Thug mé faoin aiste agus bhí sí críochnaithe agam i gceann dhá uair an chloig
result.html: Thug mé faoin aiste agus bhí sí críochnaithe agam i gceann dhá uair an chloigI got down to writing the essay and I had it finished in two hours.
result.ponchtml: Ṫug mé faoin aiste agus ḃí sí críoċnaiṫe agam i gceann ḋá uair an ċloigI got down to writing the essay and I had it finished in two hours.

result.eng: I had made promises I wasn't able to keep.
result.ga: Thug mé geallúintí nach raibh mé in ann a chomhlíonadh
result.orig: Thug mé geallúintí nach raibh mé in ann a chomhlíonadh
result.html: Thug mé geallúintí nach raibh mé in ann a chomhlíonadhI had made promises I wasn't able to keep.
result.ponchtml: Ṫug mé geallúintí naċ raiḃ mé in ann a ċoṁlíonaḋI had made promises I wasn't able to keep.

result.eng: They took to the mountains.
result.ga: Thug siad an sliabh orthu féin
result.orig: Thug siad an sliabh orthu féin
result.html: Thug siad an sliabh orthu féinThey took to the mountains.
result.ponchtml: Ṫug siad an sliaḃ orṫu féinThey took to the mountains.

result.eng: They made me an offer I couldn't refuse.
result.ga: Thug siad tairiscint dom nárbh fhéidir liom eiteach di
result.orig: Thug siad tairiscint dom nárbh fhéidir liom eiteach di
result.html: Thug siad tairiscint dom nárbh fhéidir liom eiteach diThey made me an offer I couldn't refuse.
result.ponchtml: Ṫug siad tairiscint dom nárḃ ḟéidir liom eiteaċ diThey made me an offer I couldn't refuse.

result.eng: He gave me a promise that he would come back.
result.ga: Thug sé geall dom go dtiocfaidh sé ar ais
result.orig: Thug sé geall dom go dtiocfaidh sé ar ais
result.html: Thug sé geall dom go dtiocfaidh sé ar aisHe gave me a promise that he would come back.
result.ponchtml: Ṫug sé geall dom go dtiocfaiḋ sé ar aisHe gave me a promise that he would come back.

result.eng: She has given us very reasonable advice.
result.ga: Thug sí comhairle an-chiallmhar dúinn
result.orig: Thug sí comhairle an-chiallmhar dúinn
result.html: Thug sí comhairle an-chiallmhar dúinnShe has given us very reasonable advice.
result.ponchtml: Ṫug sí coṁairle an-ċiallṁar dúinnShe has given us very reasonable advice.

result.eng: She gave us an account of her adventures in Africa.
result.ga: Thug sí cuntas dúinn ar a heachtraí san Afraic
result.orig: Thug sí cuntas dúinn ar a heachtraí san Afraic
result.html: Thug sí cuntas dúinn ar a heachtraí san AfraicShe gave us an account of her adventures in Africa.
result.ponchtml: Ṫug sí cuntas dúinn ar a heaċtraí san AfraicShe gave us an account of her adventures in Africa.

result.eng: I am much indebted to you for the support you've given me.
result.ga: Tá mé go mór faoi chomaoin agat as an tacaíocht a thug tú dom
result.orig: Tá mé go mór faoi chomaoin agat as an tacaíocht a thug tú dom
result.html: Tá mé go mór faoi chomaoin agat as an tacaíocht a thug tú domI am much indebted to you for the support you've given me.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé go mór faoi ċomaoin agat as an tacaíoċt a ṫug tú domI am much indebted to you for the support you've given me.

result.eng: She gave me a prescription and I got the medicine in the pharmacy but the medicine makes me tired.
result.ga: Thug sí oideas dom agus fuair mé an cógas sa gcógaslann ach cuireann an cógas sin tuirse orm
result.orig: Thug sí oideas dom agus fuair mé an cógas sa gcógaslann ach cuireann an cógas sin tuirse orm
result.html: Thug sí oideas dom agus fuair mé an cógas sa gcógaslann ach cuireann an cógas sin tuirse ormShe gave me a prescription and I got the medicine in the pharmacy but the medicine makes me tired.
result.ponchtml: Ṫug sí oideas dom agus fuair mé an cógas sa gcógaslann aċ cuireann an cógas sin tuirse ormShe gave me a prescription and I got the medicine in the pharmacy but the medicine makes me tired.

result.eng: It was the children who saved us!
result.ga: Na leanaí a thug slán sinn
result.orig: Na leanaí a thug slán sinn
result.html: Na leanaí a thug slán sinnIt was the children who saved us!
result.ponchtml: Na leanaí a ṫug slán sinnIt was the children who saved us!

result.eng: ...before they went to their dull houses in the suburbs.
result.ga: sular thug siad aghaidh ar a dtithe murtallacha sna bruachbhailte
result.orig: sular thug siad aghaidh ar a dtithe murtallacha sna bruachbhailte
result.html: sular thug siad aghaidh ar a dtithe murtallacha sna bruachbhailte...before they went to their dull houses in the suburbs.
result.ponchtml: sular ṫug siad aġaiḋ ar a dtiṫe murtallaċa sna bruaċḃailte...before they went to their dull houses in the suburbs.

result.eng: I visited the city in the eighties.
result.ga: Thug mé cuairt ar an chathair sna hochtóidí
result.orig: Thug mé cuairt ar an chathair sna hochtóidí
result.html: Thug mé cuairt ar an chathair sna hochtóidíI visited the city in the eighties.
result.ponchtml: Ṫug mé cuairt ar an ċaṫair sna hoċtóidíI visited the city in the eighties.

result.eng: The Prime Minister announced to the media that he was about to resign.
result.ga: Thug an Príomh-Aire le fios do na meáin go raibh sé ar tí éirí as
result.orig: Thug an Príomh-Aire le fios do na meáin go raibh sé ar tí éirí as
result.html: Thug an Príomh-Aire le fios do na meáin go raibh sé ar tí éirí asThe Prime Minister announced to the media that he was about to resign.
result.ponchtml: Ṫug an Príoṁ-Aire le fios do na meáin go raiḃ sé ar tí éirí asThe Prime Minister announced to the media that he was about to resign.

result.eng: They gave her some pocket money.
result.ga: Thug siad airgead póca di
result.orig: Thug siad airgead póca di
result.html: Thug siad airgead póca diThey gave her some pocket money.
result.ponchtml: Ṫug siad airgead póca diThey gave her some pocket money.

result.eng: He spent some time in Paris before he headed to America.
result.ga: Chaith sé seal i bPáras sular thug sé aghaidh ar Mheiriceá
result.orig: Chaith sé seal i bPáras sular thug sé aghaidh ar Mheiriceá
result.html: Chaith sé seal i bPáras sular thug sé aghaidh ar MheiriceáHe spent some time in Paris before he headed to America.
result.ponchtml: Ċaiṫ sé seal i bPáras sular ṫug sé aġaiḋ ar ṀeiriceáHe spent some time in Paris before he headed to America.

result.eng: The Trade Centre's south tower let go [ie. started collapsing].
result.ga: Thug túr theas an Lárionad Trádála uaidh
result.orig: Thug túr theas an Lárionad Trádála uaidh
result.html: Thug túr theas an Lárionad Trádála uaidhThe Trade Centre's south tower let go [ie. started collapsing].
result.ponchtml: Ṫug túr ṫeas an Lárionad Trádála uaiḋThe Trade Centre's south tower let go [ie. started collapsing].

result.eng: Because of these developments, the citizen now had a toolbox that gave him the chance to function as a journalist, globally and at little cost.
result.ga: De bharr na bhforbairtí seo bhí bosca uirlisí cumarsáide ag an saoránach a thug deis dó feidhmiú mar iriseoir ar bhonn domhanda agus ar bheagán costais
result.orig: De bharr na bhforbairtí seo bhí bosca uirlisí cumarsáide ag an saoránach a thug deis dó feidhmiú mar iriseoir ar bhonn domhanda agus ar bheagán costais
result.html: De bharr na bhforbairtí seo bhí bosca uirlisí cumarsáide ag an saoránach a thug deis dó feidhmiú mar iriseoir ar bhonn domhanda agus ar bheagán costaisBecause of these developments, the citizen now had a toolbox that gave him the chance to function as a journalist, globally and at little cost.
result.ponchtml: De ḃarr na ḃforbairtí seo ḃí bosca uirlisí cumarsáide ag an saoránaċ a ṫug deis dó feiḋmiú mar iriseoir ar ḃonn doṁanda agus ar ḃeagán costaisBecause of these developments, the citizen now had a toolbox that gave him the chance to function as a journalist, globally and at little cost.

result.eng: That's why I came here. That's what brought me this way.
result.ga: Sin an rud a thug an bealach mé
result.orig: Sin an rud a thug an bealach mé
result.html: Sin an rud a thug an bealach méThat's why I came here. That's what brought me this way.
result.ponchtml: Sin an rud a ṫug an bealaċ méThat's why I came here. That's what brought me this way.

result.eng: They gave me as much education as they could afford.
result.ga: Thug siad scoil agus léann domh ar feadh a n-acmhainne
result.orig: Thug siad scoil agus léann domh ar feadh a n-acmhainne
result.html: Thug siad scoil agus léann domh ar feadh a n-acmhainneThey gave me as much education as they could afford.
result.ponchtml: Ṫug siad scoil agus léann doṁ ar feaḋ a n-acṁainneThey gave me as much education as they could afford.

result.eng: There is no describing the love I had for that girl.
result.ga: Níl léamh nó scríobh nó inse béil ar an ghrá a thug mise don chailín udaí
result.orig: Níl léamh nó scríobh nó inse béil ar an ghrá a thug mise don chailín udaí
result.html: Níl léamh nó scríobh nó inse béil ar an ghrá a thug mise don chailín udaíThere is no describing the love I had for that girl.
result.ponchtml: Níl léaṁ nó scríoḃ nó inse béil ar an ġrá a ṫug mise don ċailín udaíThere is no describing the love I had for that girl.

result.eng: They all made a promise to one another.
result.ga: Thug 'ach aon duine acu lámh is focal don duine eile
result.orig: Thug 'ach aon duine acu lámh is focal don duine eile
result.html: Thug 'ach aon duine acu lámh is focal don duine eileThey all made a promise to one another.
result.ponchtml: Ṫug 'aċ aon duine acu láṁ is focal don duine eileThey all made a promise to one another.
